      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cluster(java.lang.String hashtagToCluser)
      this method calls the clustering steps: 1.orthography cleaning 2.keyphrase extraction with a co-occurence graph approach 3.adapting to the ClusterElement.class (includes some cleaning of posts etc...) 4.finally these elements are binary serialized Uncomment the marked parts for additional visualization via JUNG or syso

      • cluster

        public void cluster(java.lang.String hashtagToCluser)
        this method calls the clustering steps: 1.orthography cleaning 2.keyphrase extraction with a co-occurence graph approach 3.adapting to the ClusterElement.class (includes some cleaning of posts etc...) 4.finally these elements are binary serialized Uncomment the marked parts for additional visualization via JUNG or syso
